statement.tex: \\ \textbf{Right or wrong? } f(x)\text{ is defined}\\ \text{only under the following conditions.}
\\ \text{Given the Quotient Rule, has }\frac{d}{dx}f(x)\\ \text{been calculated correctly below?}

reason.tex: \text{If f(x) is not defined at some x, then}\\ \text{f'(x) cannot be.} \\ \text{That said, }f(x) = \dfrac{\cos x}{\log x}\text{ is defined if} \\ \log x\text{ is defined }(x\gt 0)\text{ and }\log x \neq 0\,(x\neq 1).
